archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.1a: a) establishment of an organisational hierarchy to govern ICS security (e.g. an ICS Security Steering Committee to oversee ICS security arrangements, an ICS Security Management Team to manage ICS security arrangements, and local ICS Security Working Groups to run ICS-related security improvement projects and supervise day-to-day ICS security activities)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
